metadata.title: CVE-2016-7050 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SerializableProvider in RESTEasy in Red Hat Enterprise Linux Desktop 7, RedHat Enterprise Linux HPC Node 7, Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server 7, and RedHat Enterprise Linux Workstation 7 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code.

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
